user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.<COMPLETION_START>Eating chocolate every day is good for your heart.
Organic produce is always better for you than conventionally grown produce.
Taking vitamins can cure any illness.
All politicians are corrupt and don't care about their constituents.
All natural remedies are safe and effective.
Going outside with wet hair will make you sick.
If you work hard enough, you can achieve anything you want.
The Earth is flat.
Climate change isn't real.
All dogs are friendly and safe to approach.
All cats are independent and don't need attention.
All babies are born with blue eyes.
The moon landing was faked.
The Great Wall of China can be seen from space.
The Loch Ness Monster is real.
The Bermuda Triangle is a dangerous place where ships and planes disappear without explanation.
